definition: unwilling to remain lonely or idle/unwilling to be left out

sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分独自一人的时间想必和寂寞扯不上什么关系。

sentences.english: I hear as if sing lonely to me.
sentences.chinese: 我徬佛听到寂寞怼莪唱歌。

sentences.english: Many people, because so lonely life by one.
sentences.chinese: 很多人，因为错爱一人而寂寞一生。

sentences.english: He spat at the lonely cigarette, misty smoke wind.
sentences.chinese: 他吐着寂寞的烟卷，飘渺的烟雾随风而散。

sentences.english: Do you understand the moon's lonely?
Suddenly, I felt the fall of the quiet, Jingde only the lonely.
sentences.chinese: 忽然间我感到了秋的静，静得只剩下了寂寞。

sentences.english: The researchers found that higher scores on a measure of chronic loneliness were associated with an increase in warmer baths or showers.
sentences.chinese: 研究者发现较高分的慢性寂寞和温度较高的洗浴有关。

sentences.english: If did not have the cloud, the sky can be lonely?
sentences.chinese: 如果没有了云，天空会不会寂寞？

sentences.english: So his former flowers are not lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这样，他以前的那些花就不寂寞了。

sentences.english: Lonely pillow dream shadow lonely moon window.
sentences.chinese: 孤单是枕畔梦影，寂寞是窗前明月。

sentences.english: Going straight with this ridiculous world and stumble over this lonely world, finally they meet at the jail….
sentences.chinese: 在这个荒诞而寂寞的世界中一路前行，跌跌撞撞。

sentences.english: The dream is over, I wonna die…
Homeless people in the dictionary, there is no loneliness, not lonely.
sentences.chinese: 在流浪人的词典里，没有寂寞，没有孤独。

sentences.english: The strongest man is the one who stands most alone .
sentences.chinese: 最坚强的人就是最能忍受孤独寂寞的人。

sentences.english: A person for a long time, even the taste of loneliness will forget.
sentences.chinese: 一个人久了，连寂寞的味道都忘了。

sentences.english: The road is lonely in its crown, for it is not loved.
sentences.chinese: 熙来攘往的街道最是寂寞，因为它不被人所爱。

definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
to be alone/to stand in isolation
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
